name: Geometry Heroes (Full)
description:
Ahh math class; as our pencils grow duller we grow sharper. but as interesting as the teacher makes it, it's hard to not allow our minds to wander. Join Bob, a cleverly personified figment of an overactive imagination, as he and his team fight against the Grievously Evil Only Mad Extra Terrible Really Yucky forces ; or GEOMETRY.

- Play as over 9 different characters

- Play with any gamepad supported by your computer

- Choose from 3 different pets to aid you in battle
- Play in an intense " Boss trials" mode where nothing stands between you and the over 5 different game bosses
- Use different combinations of characters and pets to see what fits your playstyle

Planned Features:

- Local Multilplayer ( Splitscreen)

- Online leaderboards

With the purchase you receive the Pro version of the game on android as well as the Windows 7 Version.
